email_chain.subject: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam - 7500MT of Corn
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope you're doing well. We have an inquiry for shipping 7500MT of corn from Houston to Rotterdam on FOB terms. Could you provide a freight quote and confirm vessel availability? Ideally, we are looking for a laycan between October 10-15.

Best regards,
James Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam - 7500MT of Corn
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Thanks for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN STAR, DWT 85000, LOA 250m, currently available for your cargo. The initial freight quote is USD 42.50 per MT. Laycan is flexible within your requested window. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 42.50 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you review the rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best,
James

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

I understand your concern. After reviewing, I can offer a revised rate of USD 41.00 per MT. Demurrage is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata. Loading window is 72 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Houston to Rotterdam - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

USD 41.00 sounds reasonable. We can proceed with the OCEAN STAR for a laycan of October 10-15. Please send over the charter party for review.

Best,
James

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi James,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best,
James
